descriptionHtml:
Fellow modders and Skyrim players, if you think Two-Handed weapons in Skyrim are too fast and don\'t feel heavy at all, then this mod is for you!

This simple yet realistic mod makes Skyrim Two handed weapons slower but stronger, the DPS (damage per second) doesn\'t actually change, if a weapon had 15 DPS, it still has 15 DPS, but it is slower and has more attack power, so this ISNT unbalanced or over-powered.

This changes EVERY two handed weapon in the game (except custom ones of course),
It contains Dragonborn and Dawnguard DLCS versions too (Optional).

If i forgot any two handed weapon please contact me and I will fix it!


To install it go to your Skyrim folder located in C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim, and extract the file(s) using WinRAR into the data folder, if you want to unistall it just delete SlowerRealistic2HWeapons(VANILLA).esp (If you are using Vanilla weapons)
SlowerRealistic2HWeapons(DAWNGUARD).esp (If you are using Dawnguard weapons)
SlowerRealistic2HWeapons(DRAGONBORN).esp (If you are using Dragonborn weapons)


This is the first time i decide to share a mod with the awesome Nexus Community, hope you enjoy it, if you do please leave an endorsement, and feel free to make requests!
author: xoninho
